channel.title: Minnesota AG Press Releases
channel.description: Latest press releases from the Minnesota Attorney General's Office

item.title: After pressure from Attorney General Ellison, federal agency finally distributes checks to Minnesotans defrauded by Prehired
item.description:
Publication Date: June 02, 2025

Online training program defrauded consumers and agreed to cancel debt and refund $80K to Minnesota consumers, with refunds to be distributed by the CFPB

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/06/02_Prehired.asp
